Comments_List: There were numerous insights I gained taking this course - both Professors Miller and Chinchilla provided a wealth of information on the history and archaeology of Mexico in the context of feasting. A truly one of a kind course.

I would emphatically recommend this class if it was offered again. Both professors are impressive scholars and create an inspiring work environment to discuss the themes of the class, and stimulate learning on our own terms.
